https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vNEw6H6St25991C0a8r6AQKTdqi.jpg In the winter of 1944, the Allied Armies stand ready to invade Germany at the coming of a New Year. To prevent it, Hitler orders an all-out offensive to re-take French territory and capture the major port city of Antwerp. Battle of the Bulge
